name: Jack and Jill went down Kawasan Falls!
description: One of the popular adventures here in my place is the Kawasan Canyoneering. It's an adventure that I guarantee you'd want to try again and again even after knowing that you've spent 3 hours soaked in water, hiking through big rocks, and jumping from waterfalls to waterfalls. I have never seen someone who didn't enjoy their experience on this beauty.
